=== Requirements ===

# ''Rationale:''
** Wanted for kubuntu-desktop
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=webkitkde|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: none

** In all situations the package works out of the box without configuration
** Asks no debconf questions

** Hardware: Does no deal with hardware

 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant
